<|Function_Thought|>
The previous attempt to call tools (plot_figure and get_list) was refused because the function names did not align with the checklist and the system flagged the call as incorrect. The user's request is to change the shopping account password to "NewPassword". Per the execution checklist, before updating the password I must retrieve the shopping account user information and confirm the account matches Emma Johnson. I will now call get_shopping_account_user_information to fetch account details. Once I receive the account info, I will confirm it's the correct account and then proceed to call update_shopping_account_password with the new password.
<|/Function_Thought|>

Proceed to update the shopping account password to "NewPassword" using update_shopping_account_password. Next step: call update_shopping_account_password with the requested new password.

<|Final_Answer|>
